# instrumentID

**Instance Property**

The instrument identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
var instrumentID: UInt32 { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this value to [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVExtendedNoteOnEvent/defaultInstrument].

## Configuring a Note On Event

- **midiNote**: The MIDI note number.
- **velocity**: The MDI velocity.
- **groupID**: The audio unit channel that handles the event.
- **duration**: The duration of the event, in beats.
